ppe_requirements.respiratory: NIOSH-approved organic vapor respirator for <25 ppm. SCBA for >25 ppm or unknown concentrations.
ppe_requirements.skin: Nitrile or butyl rubber gloves. Chemical-resistant clothing for liquid contact.
ppe_requirements.eye: Chemical safety goggles, face shield for splash hazard.
ppe_requirements.minimum_level: Level C for <25 ppm, Level B for >25 ppm
ppe_requirements.special_notes: Probable human carcinogen (IARC Group 2B). Extremely flammable. Irritating vapor. May polymerize explosively.

emergency_response.fire_hazard: EXTREMELY FLAMMABLE. Wide explosive range. Vapors heavier than air - travel to ignition sources. May polymerize explosively in fire.
emergency_response.fire_suppression: EVACUATE - explosion hazard. Stop flow if safe. Use dry chemical, CO2, alcohol-resistant foam. Water spray to cool containers. Do not use water jet directly on liquid.
emergency_response.spill_procedures: EVACUATE. Eliminate ignition sources. Ventilate area. SCBA for large spills. Contain with dry sand or earth. Neutralize with sodium bisulfite. Absorb with vermiculite.
emergency_response.exposure_immediate_actions: Remove to fresh air immediately. Eyes: flush with water for 15 minutes. Remove contaminated clothing. Wash skin with soap and water. Seek medical attention - irritation and carcinogen exposure concern.
emergency_response.environmental_hazards: Toxic to aquatic life. Rapidly volatilizes from water. Biodegrades quickly. Report spills.
emergency_response.special_hazards: PROBABLE HUMAN CARCINOGEN (IARC 2B). Respiratory tract carcinogen in animals. Extremely flammable. May polymerize violently when contaminated. Narcotic at high concentrations. Irritating to eyes and respiratory tract.

storage_requirements.temperature_range: Store below 20°C, refrigerate. Keep away from heat.
storage_requirements.ventilation: Outdoor storage strongly preferred. Indoor: explosion-proof ventilation. Gas detection mandatory.
storage_requirements.container_material: Stainless steel or aluminum. Must be stabilized. Never use copper or iron containers.
storage_requirements.segregation: Separate from oxidizers and incompatibles by 20 feet. Flammable liquid storage cabinet.
storage_requirements.quantity_limits: Minimize quantities. Many facilities limit to <10 gallons.
storage_requirements.special_requirements: CRITICAL: Store with stabilizer. Check stabilizer regularly. Refrigerated storage required. Inert gas blanketing (nitrogen). Post "EXTREMELY FLAMMABLE" and "CANCER HAZARD" signs.

acgih_tlv.ceiling: 25 ppm (confirmed animal carcinogen with unknown relevance to humans)

reactivity.stability: UNSTABLE. Polymerizes readily. Must be stabilized. Oxidizes in air.
reactivity.polymerization: Violent exothermic polymerization with acids, bases, or contaminants. Stabilizer required.
reactivity.reactivity_hazard: EXTREMELY REACTIVE. Polymerizes violently. Reacts violently with oxidizers. Forms explosive peroxides with air. May self-heat and ignite.

environmental_impact.aquatic_toxicity: Toxic to aquatic life. LC50 (fish, 96h): 50-150 mg/L.
environmental_impact.biodegradability: Readily biodegradable (>70% in 28 days). Oxidizes to acetic acid.
environmental_impact.soil_mobility: High mobility. Volatilizes rapidly from soil.
environmental_impact.atmospheric_fate: Photolyzes rapidly. Forms peroxyacetyl nitrate (PAN). Atmospheric half-life: 9 hours.
